Text:
Thanks!
Now maybe you can enjoy this game:)

It seems like it doesn't work 100% 
I saved the game and when i started the game later it didn't load from where i saved. It starts from a couple of weeks/months earlier thn i saved the last time.
How does it work for you??
Actually, I experienced the same problem. I solved it by saving the game with a different name everytime and not overwriting it.
kaZmur: ok, im gonna do that than and see if it works. thanks for the tips!
Even the saving with diferent name doesn't work for me, the savegame just doesn't get created.. And it looks like that when this problem occurs, I can't anymore save the game..
What version do you have, when you look at the main menu( right down )? Mine says that I have version 1.1

I'he done some research, and I found that I can't save game, when I buy any item from the promotion section at the shop.
I have only 10,000$ so I can try only items that I can buy( can anybody try the more expensive items? ) but bass guitar, mic, drum, and misc that I bought doesn't do any problem when saving game.. only the promotion items..
So don't use promotion items, and have a luck when saving..

You're right abot the part that the patch doesn't fix the problem. Your theory about promotions is interesting. I hope it works 'cause the guys at game mill obviously have some problems fixing the problem. I also encountered another problem today... all of a sudden my finances say I have "$nan" and all of my gigs have capacity 0. Anyone seen that before?

It seems enterthenamehere is right... just avoid buying promotions from the store and it will save fine. I saved my game once for every 500 fans and I played for about 10 hours without any problems. So, yes, the patch works if you don't buy any promos.

As i read on the net, save works even without patch, if you don't buy promo's.
For what is patch then - i don't know, maybe some other bugs fixed.
Anyway, thanks for the upload...

Seed on...
